attributes.action: Cap the price of resale tickets for gigs and events through resale websites.
attributes.additional_details:
With the last few years of Covid-19, as people are now getting back to normality. These gigs and events are critical for peoples health & wellbeing. Being forced to either pay a premium for a ticket during this cost of living crisis or missing out on a social event watching something they enjoy has a detrimental effect. 

Personally I’ve been lucky to secure tickets at face value when needed. This petition is for the greater cause! Help normal people attend normal events at normal prices.
attributes.background: Cap the price on resale websites to 10% - 15%.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622416
